Nerangs.ab: pas us.moi uzārəšuuā ahurā. zōhr ul dārišn pad ēd wacist az dašn ud pad ēd wacist az hōy pad ēd wacist pad war ī zōhrag dārišn pad čahārom wacist abar barsom nihišn pad sar ī māhrūg dārišn ārmaitī təuuīšīm. ...

"Afterwards, at us.moi uzārəšuuā ahurā, he has to hold the zōhr up, during the first stanza, to the right; during the second stanza, to the left; during the third stanza, close to the zōhrag; during the fourth stanza, he has to put it on the barsom, on the top of the māhrōy (and he has to continue with) ārmaitī təuuīšīm..."

Quotations.ab: Cf. N28.47h, cf. Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003: p. 109:
pad us mōi uzārəšuuā ahurā ārmaitī təuuīšīm dasuuā ul 3 wacist az dašn ēk hōy ēk pad war ī zōhrag dārēd

"During the threefold recitation of us mōi uzārəšuuā ahurā ārmaitī təuuīšīm dasuuā he should hold it up during the three stanzas, at one to right side, at one to the left and once and at one close to the zōhrag."
